commandDescription: Validates alignment between XML and CSV representations of global value set translations using string comparison or logic comparison
inputFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of global value set translation names to validate (without extension). If not specified, all global value set translations will be validated
modeFlagDescription: Validation mode: 'string' for full string comparison, 'logic' for in-memory structure comparison (default: %s)
validationSuccess: ✅ Global Value Set Translation '%s' is properly aligned
validationError: ❌ Global Value Set Translation '%s' has misalignment
noGlobalValueSetTranslationsFound: No global value set translations found to validate
validationSummary: Validation Summary: %s global value set translations validated, %s aligned, %s misaligned
